thread.title: Drought takes a toll on the giant pumpkins of Half Moon Bay
thread.title_full: Drought takes a toll on the giant pumpkins of Half Moon Bay - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Steve Rubenstein
title: Drought takes a toll on the giant pumpkins of Half Moon Bay
text:
Photo: Brian Feulner, Brian Feulner/ San Francisco Chr Steve Daletas, fourth from right, hugs his wife Susie or Pleasant Hill, Oregon, while standing on stage with his mother Jeanette and father Mitch, right, after Daletas' pumpkin weighed in at 1,969 pounds winning the 42nd annual Half-moon Bay Championship Pumpkin Weigh-off Monday October 12, 2015 in Halfmoon Bay, Calif. Steve Daletas, fourth from right, hugs his wife Susie or Pleasant...
On top of everything else the drought gets blamed for, add the not-quite-as-giant pumpkins of Half Moon Bay. Steve Daletas, fourth from right, hugs his wife Susie or Pleasant Hill, Oregon, while standing on stage with his mother Jeanette and father Mitch, right, after Daletas' pumpkin weighed in at 1,969 pounds winning the 42nd annual Half-moon Bay Championship Pumpkin Weigh-off Monday October 12, 2015 in Halfmoon Bay, Calif. Steve Daletas, fourth from right, hugs his wife Susie or Pleasant...
On top of everything else the drought gets blamed for, add the not-quite-as-giant pumpkins of Half Moon Bay.
